justification: Proposal misreads Team B: a conservative, win-now manager wouldn’t trade their Tier 1 RB (Alex Thompson) for an Out WR. Calling Derek Harris a steady possession WR ignores his injury and deep-threat volatility. B’s RB depth is thin, WR room is deep, and they need immediate floor, not stash. Rationale is generic and misaligned; acceptance probability is unrealistic.
